meanings.sent1: The math problem was onerier than I expected.
meanings.sent2: Carrying the heavy boxes up the stairs was onerier than I thought.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle all those balls at once was onerier than trying to juggle cats!
meanings.sent4: The weight of responsibility felt onerier than a mountain on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds looming overhead made the atmosphere onerier with each passing minute.

meanings.sent1: The taste of the medicine was onerier than I remembered.
meanings.sent2: The smell of the garbage in the alley was onerier than usual.
meanings.sent3: The thought of eating broccoli was onerier than the idea of swimming with sharks!
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room grew onerier with each passing moment.
meanings.sent5: The sound of nails on a chalkboard is onerier to some people than others.
